A A CHAUS,
ADVOCATE,
OFFICE: F-91, 1st Floor, Abul Fazal Enclave Part I,
Jamia Nagar, New Delhi- 110025
MOBILE- 08149757883, EMAIL- aachaus@gmail.com

BY SPEED POST/EMAIL

Date: 19.10.2020

To

Facebook India Online Services Private Limited,
Regd. office: Unit Nos. 1203 and 1204,
Level 12, Building No.20, Raheja Mindspace,
Cyberabad, Madhapur, Hitech City, Hyderabad
Telangana 500081
Email- tvk@fb.com

Sir,

Under the instructions from and on behalf of my client Mr. Mohd
Abuzar, residence at
                                                      I hereby serve you with the following legal

Notice:

1. That you, the Noticee is an incorporated company under the
   Companies Act (as amended upto date) as a subsidiary of a
   foreign company i.e. Facebook Inc. having registered office at
   _________________________________________________

--- Page 2 ---
A A CHAUS
ADVOCATE

Unit Nos. 1203 and 1204, Level 12, Building No.20, Raheja
Mindspace, Cyberabad, Madhapur, Hitech City, Hyderabad
Telangana 500081. That you, the Noticee run a social
networking Website and Application i.e. www.facebook.com and
Facebook App (hereinafter to be referred to as ‘the said
platform’).

2. That my client is a concerned citizen of India and a social activist
and associated with a Non-governmental Organization
ANHAD (Act Now for Harmony and Democracy).

3. That you, the Noticee have started the said platform in 2006 and
have made public offers through various means including public
advertisements etc. to join the said platform and made
assurances about privacy and safety of information of users. It is
pertinent to mention here that you, the Noticee maintain a
webpage at https://www.facebook.com/safety, wherein you, the
Noticee claims that ‘Our mission is to give people the power to
share and to make the world more open and connected. We
want everyone to feel safe when using Facebook. We work with
external experts, including a Safety Advisory Board, and gather
feedback from our community to develop policies, tools and
resources to keep you safe.’

4. That my client in pursuance of your said offers and assurances
has signed up and opened a user account
‘facebook.com/abuzar.choudhary’ in year 2010 and also advised
his friends and relatives to join the said platform and
accordingly developed a network of friends and relatives on the

Page 2 of 6

--- Page 3 ---
A A CHAUS
ADVOCATE

said platform. At present my client is connected with 4600
friends and more than 700 followers.
5. To the utter shock and dismay of my client, on 13th September
2020, my client woke up with a number of phone calls from
friends and relatives expressing their grief and many friends
visited his house with the same grief. They informed to my client
that you, the Noticee has published a public message on my
client's user account of the said platform asking friends and
relatives to tribute my client and to share stories, commemorate
a special day.
6. That my client immediately turned to the said platform and tried
to log in, but a message appeared 'Account unavailable This
account is in a special memorialised state. If you have any
questions, please visit the help centre for more information'. My
client followed the instructions provided by you, the Noticee
through the said message and accordingly received email dated
13.09.2020, the said email asked my client to upload a photo
holding a government ID, accordingly my client uploaded the
same, but received no response.
7. That my client again approached you, the Noticee and received a
mail dated 16.09.2020, and my client followed the instructions
provided by you, the Noticee, however the issue remained
unresolved. It appears to my client that you, the Noticee have
made the account of my client unavailable and spread
unsubstantiated information of his death with a view to cause
mental trauma and harassment, the same is evident from the
Page 3 of 6

--- Page 4 ---
A A CHAUS
ADVOCATE

fact that you, the Noticee have not taken the cognizance of
requests made by my client on the said website.
8. That my client genuinely believes that you, the Noticee have
abruptly, whimsically and arbitrarily suspended his account
with malafide intent, as the same is evident from the fact that
you, the Noticee have not followed any procedure nor attempted
to confirm the information, if any received to you, the Noticee.
Further, you, the Noticee have not taken cognizance to the
requests made by my client despite the compliance of my client
to the instructions made by you, the Noticee.
9. That the friends and relatives of my client have made various
requests on twitter by tagging you, the Noticee to restore the
account of my client and to make a public apology, however the
efforts of his friends and relatives also failed.
10. That you, the Noticee remained adamant and not even
responded to the aforesaid requests of my client, his friends and
relatives; such inaction on your part is completely unbearable
and intolerable in the eyes of Indian Legal System. The said
inaction of you, the Noticee also reveals that you, the Noticee
does not have transparency and accountability in your
organisational structure, and grievance redressal mechanism.
11. That it appears to my client from the conduct of you, the
Noticee that you, the Noticee have initiated the aforesaid action
with evil design and intent to cause mental agony and
harassment to my client only because he is vocal on the issues
affecting and relating to the public.

Page 4 of 6

--- Page 5 ---
A A CHAUS
ADVOCATE
12. That you, the Noticee are bound by law to act in
accordance with the Indian Constitution. It is pertinent to
mention here that the impugned action of you, the Noticee to
terminate the user account of client on a false and frivolous
reason is violative of most precious and celebrated right of
freedom of speech under Article 19 (1) (a) of the Constitution of
India. Further, the said impugned action of you, the Noticee
being arbitrary also violates the fundamental right guaranteed
under the Article 14 of the Constitution of India.
13. That you, the Noticee have caused immense trauma and
torture to my client and to his friends and relatives by
publishing the abovesaid false and frivolous statement/message
on the said platform. Further, the termination of the said
account has also caused irreparable loss to my client. It is
pertinent to mention here that you, the Noticee do not have any
right or authority to publish such uncorroborated and false
information which severely affects my client. By indulging in
such activities as narrated above, you, the noticee have also
committed series of cognizable offences under the Indian Penal
Code, 1860.
14. By this Legal Notice, you, the Noticee, are hereby
immediately called upon to-
a) tender an unconditional apology to my client; both in writing
as well as by way of publishing an unconditional apology on
the said platform and on your official page in the same

Page 5 of 6

--- Page 6 ---
A A CHAUS
ADVOCATE

manner and on the same level of prominence as the above-
mentioned information was published.
b) revoke the termination of the said facebook account i.e.
'facebook.com/abuzar.choudhary'.
c) A compensation of Rs. 5,00,000/- for causing immense trauma,
torture by publishing the abovesaid information.
In the light of the aforesaid factual matrix, we, hereby call upon you,
the Noticee through this legal notice to comply with the demands as
mentioned in the preceding para, failing which, we have positive
instructions to initiate appropriate legal proceedings, both civil and
criminal against you, the Noticee which shall entirely be at the risks
and cost of you the Noticee.
Please take further notice that in case of the failure on your part to
comply with the above said demands within a period of seven days
from the receipt of the present notice my client will have no option
but to initiate legal proceedings as mentioned above.

A copy of this legal notice has been retained in our office for further
record and future reference.

Thanking You.

Chaus Abdul Aziz
Advocate

Enrl. No. MAH/8061/2018
